1123160.name: Voids Adrift
1123160.description:
Voids Adrift® is an upcoming massively multiplayer online roleplaying adventure game (MMORPG) that takes a different approach to games and the genre.

Players and their ships explore, mine and battle in a handcrafted world in breathtaking stylised detail.
Voids Adrift take players across realms and islands as they seek to enrich themselves as merchants, fight pirates, become pirates or build alliances that span across the Void and everything in between.

Players craft their ships in an innovative shipbuilding system and inhabit a world rich in diversity and lore uncommon to most genre-titans. From arabesque cities of the desert islands to the snowy settlements of the tundras. Experience different cultures, dynamics and resources to further your adventures across the Voids.

Player-Driven Economy


In a Player-Driven Economy, each Nomad makes a difference. From small-time adventures selling their disused items after a quest to large market-shaking trade confederations, the economy assumes an identity of its own. Modelled after real-world economic systems, it brings this real, breathing world to life!

Fight The Good Fight


Players come together in small skirmishes to enormous fleet battles across the Skies. Secure commonly used trade routes, safeguard your favourite towns and gain key resources for your alliance. With extensive battle mechanics, players can customize their ships to be small and nimble, slow-heavy hitters and fine-tune their ships to your playstyle and meet the needs of your solo adventuring or your alliance's.

Enormous Maps


Voids Adrift feature countless islands, cities and villages. Each with its unique flavour and culture inspired by diverse real-world cultures. Whether in the open skies, on frequently used routes, or to the far outflung reaches of the skies, survival will rely on knowing your surroundings. With equal risk comes equal reward as you find the most valuable loot in the most lawless of areas.

VR / Switch / Crossplay


Voids Adrift is designed from the ground up to be VR-compatible and includes a planned release for the Nintendo Switch. These details are subject to change closer to commercial release.
1123160.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
